entry.title: Russia Gains Ground in Bid to Encircle Troops Defending Ukraine's East
entry.content: Fierce fighting raged in the Donbas region, with Russian forces engaging in street battles in the city of Severodonetsk as Moscow brought to bear its advantage in firepower on outgunned Ukrainian defenders.

entry.title: How Misha, a 19-Year-Old With Down Syndrome, Escaped Ukraine
entry.content: For those with disabilities, the trauma of war is magnified; “usual life has been destroyed.”

entry.title: Israeli Work Permits for Gazans Help Deter War With Hamas for Now
entry.content: An Israeli nationalist march through Arab neighborhoods in Jerusalem on Sunday could put Israel’s strategy of work permits for peace to the test.
